attributes.action: promote inclusion by society of "Hidden" disability such as Autism ensuring that it is catered for and understood,on an equal basis with physical disability.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "promote inclusion by society of "Hidden" disability such as Autism ensuring that it is catered for and understood,on an equal basis with physical disability."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16631


Prime Minister's Office
